subject: Reimbursement of Children Education Allowance and Hostel Subsidy in accordance with New Education Policy 2020- reg.
text: IRdy 75iy WTTHRf gferazrot (73w5 4aevt &7 TNTANf FAR4, HRT  RRTFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) HrHa * vil-5 & 6, 7der-10, &ra5, 78f fcalt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI /Policy Guidelines /Administration /2025 Policy Circular No. 1.3.1.39/2025 dated 02nd April, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/11041/01/2000-Admn(Pt) (Comp. No. 94547)} Sub: Reimbursement of Children Education Allowance and Hostel Subsidy in accordance with New Education Policy 2020 reg: The Competent Authority has approved that the Children Education Allowance (CEA) and Hostel Subsidy is admissible in respect of Children studying from three classes before class one to 12th Standard (irrespective of nomenclature of class) and also for the initial two years of a Diploma / Certificate Course from Polytechnic/ ITI/ Engineering College, if the Child pursues the Course after passing Standard and the Government Servant has not been granted CEA/Hostel Subsidy in respect of the Child for Studies in 11th and 12th Standards in accordance with the Provisions contained in the Department of Personnel & Training OM No.A- 27012/01/2023-Pers.Policy (Allowance) dated 14.03.2024 (copy enclosed at Annexure-I) read with Various Orders/ Directives/ Instructions on the Subject issued by the Government NHAI from to time. 2 _ The other Instructions issued vide DoPT's O.M. dated 14.03.2024 shall apply mutatis mutandis to all Employees of NHAI: 3_ The Concerned Officers/ Finance Division at NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs are requested to take necessary action in this matter. 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl: As stated above (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ic Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers & Employees of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2.
